treatment.reference: Discovery of a free-living chlorophyll d-producing cyanobacterium with a hybrid proteobacterial/cyanobacterial small-subunit rRNA gene (Miller, S., et al., 2004)
treatment.description: 1.5–2 μm for long axis. CCMEE 5410 produces large amounts of Chl d. It has peripherally stacked thylakoid membranes.
